name: Gulliver Syndrome F2P
description:
After finding a porcelain statue that brings you strange dreams, you struggle to find answers. What starts as an ordinary search quickly leads you to another world, one where you’re a giant pursued by miniature people! But these small hunters are anything but cute as you try to find Gulliver, your only known hope for survival.

With dangerous powers at play and your life on the line, can you stop a dangerous adversary to save yourself and Lilliputia in time? Find out in this exhilarating Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

DOWNLOAD AND PLAY THE MAIN GAME FOR ABSOLUTELY FREE, BUT IF YOU FEEL STUCK OR DON’T WANT TO SOLVE A MINI-GAME, YOU MAY BUY HINTS TO HELP YOU PROCEED QUICKER!

Gulliver Syndrome F2P features are:

• Immerse yourself in an amazing adventure!
• Solve intuitive mini-games, brain teasers, & unique puzzles.
• Explore 40+ stunning locations.
• Spectacular graphics!
• Assemble collections, seek & find morphing objects.
